mapper.insert: INSERT INTO S_USER_T( phone_id, `name`, password, signature, avatar, e_mail, birthday, available, created_by, creation_date, last_updated_by, last_updated_date) VALUES ( #{userVO.phoneId}, #{userVO.name}, #{userVO.password}, #{userVO.signature}, #{userVO.avatar}, #{userVO.eMail}, #{userVO.birthday}, #{userVO.available}, #{userVO.createdBy}, #{userVO.creationDate}, #{userVO.lastUpdatedBy}, #{userVO.lastUpdatedDate} )

INSERT INTO s_user_role_t ( user_id, role_id, available, created_by, creation_date, last_updated_by, last_updated_date ) SELECT #{userId}, s.id, 1, #{userId}, SYSDATE(), #{userId}, SYSDATE() FROM s_role_t s WHERE s.code IN
#{code}
mapper.update: UPDATE s_user_t t SET t.`phone_id` = #{userVO.phoneId}, t.`name` = #{userVO.name}, t.`signature` = #{userVO.signature}, t.`avatar` = #{userVO.avatar}, t.`e_mail` = #{userVO.eMail}, t.`birthday` = #{userVO.birthday}, t.`available` = #{userVO.available} WHERE t.`id` = #{userVO.id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM S_USER_T T WHERE T.AVAILABLE = 1 AND T.ID = #{id}

SELECT u.*, r.`id` AS r_id, r.`code`, r.`name`, r.`description`, r.`available`, r.`created_by`, r.`creation_date`, r.`last_updated_by`, r.`last_updated_date` FROM S_USER_T u INNER JOIN s_user_role_t rt ON u.`id` = rt.`user_id` AND rt.`available` = 1 AND u.AVAILABLE = 1 LEFT JOIN s_role_t r ON rt.`role_id` = r.`id` AND r.`available` = 1 WHERE u.PHONE_ID = #{phoneId}
